extension_description.message: Adds functionality to Bilibili (Danmaku Video Site). Now with a new and improved follow engine.

page_action_title.description: Share the current video using Plugin

general_save_error.message:
Oh, dear! Something went wrong while saving.
 Please reload.

general_no_results.message: Sorry, I couldn't find any results for your search terms.

content_collect_sp.message: Add the topic "$series$" to the follow list?
content_collect_sp.description: Add a series to the follow list

dialog_enter_console.message: Please input the password to access the console:

prompt_progress_too_large.message: Hey there! The current episode number you've entered is greater than the total number of anticipated episodes. Please fix it!

prompt_progress_blank.message: You've left the current episode or total count blank. Please fill in a value.

prompt_progress_err.message: Please make sure you've entered a numerical value for the current or total.

prompt_existing_record.message:
Hey! It looks like you already have a follow record with the same name.
 Are you sure you wish to add another one?
